version_description:
v0.0561
Golden creatures stats are now one star higher than normal creatures.
Bug fixes.

v0.0561
Golden creatures stats are now one star higher than normal creatures.
Bug fixes.

'Resource depleted' window is now smaller and doesn't interfere with gameplay.
Joystick now keeps its position when going in and out of Battles.
Fixed an issue where your ant could get stuck in Battles.
Fixed a visual bug where Battle creatures show incorrect stars amount.
Improved performance.
Bug fixes.

'Resource depleted' window is now smaller and doesn't interfere with gameplay.
Joystick now keeps its position when going in and out of Battles.
Fixed an issue where your ant could get stuck in Battles.
Fixed a visual bug where Battle creatures show incorrect stars amount.
Improved performance.
Bug fixes.

v0.0564
'Resource depleted' window is now smaller and doesn't interfere with gameplay.
Joystick now keeps its position when going in and out of Battles.

v0.0564
'Resource depleted' window is now smaller and doesn't interfere with gameplay.
Joystick now keeps its position when going in and out of Battles.
Fixed an issue where your ant could get stuck in Battles.
Fixed a visual bug where Battle creatures show incorrect stars amount.
Improved performance.
Bug fixes.

v0.0566
Fixed an issue during Battles where sometimes soldiers get stuck when coming in and out of anthill.
Added and changed some texts.
Bug fixes.

v0.0566
Fixed an issue during Battles where sometimes soldiers get stuck when coming in and out of anthill.
Added and changed some texts.
Bug fixes.

v0.0568
Added spawn timers for creatures, aphid farms and red ants.
Added an alert message when you attack a wild creature and the creature army is full.
Adjusted difficulty of fire ants nest.
Leaves and seeds will not spawn on top of each other or too close to anthill anymore.
Fixed an issue where Bombardier sometimes attacks non stop during Battles.
Fixed an issue where soldiers sometimes follow player ant when they are not recruited.
Bug fixes.

v0.0568
Added spawn timers for creatures, aphid farms and red ants.
Added an alert message when you attack a wild creature and the creature army is full.
Adjusted difficulty of fire ants nest.
Leaves and seeds will not spawn on top of each other or too close to anthill anymore.
Fixed an issue where Bombardier sometimes attacks non stop during Battles.
Fixed an issue where soldiers sometimes follow player ant when they are not recruited.
Bug fixes.

v0.0580
Added new map area - a big tree to explore
Added new resource and Chamber - Resin Chamber
Queen chamber can now be upgraded further
New bonuses in the Resin shop
Garrison, you can now assign soldiers to defend a position in the map
30 new quests
Premium item - Strawberry - unlimited supply of leaves and food.

v0.0599
Added the defensive plant "Venus flytrap" upgradeable with resin.
Added the remaining resin bonuses.
Added an option to test your own defense, from the Defense tab.
Added a special skin reward by completing the fire ant nest.
Added many new ant skins in the Gem shop.
Reduced crashes when coming back from Battles.
Performance improvement.
Many bug fixes.

v0.0636
Co-operative mode is here!
Some resin and honeydew bonuses can now be upgraded beyond level 5.
Fixed being disconnected randomly from Co-operative.
Reduced the issue where Termite king spins non-stop in some occassions.
Bug fixes.
